item.description: Come join Liz Loveday at her house in Hampton this Saturday. It's one of the days of the Hampton Seafood Festival and and Liz is inviting us to her home for some good company and to watch the fireworks. Liz's house is in the southern part of Hampton Beach and is a good viewing spot for the fireworks.
item.how_to_find_us: Perkins Ave is off Ashworth Ave

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute Fireworks/Seafood Festival in Hampton
